title: Amazon's Echo Show 5 smart display is $25 off now — get one for $65
text:
Amazon

The Amazon Echo Show 5 is a smart display that gives the ultra-powerful Alexa a more visual touch.

The device allows you to control smart home devices, watch videos, ask Alexa questions, play music, and more.

For a limited time, it's on sale for $64.99, which is $25 off the normal price.

Amazon's Alexa is a great digital assistant, but sometimes, you might want a little visual information to go along with Alexa's skills. In that case, we recommend checking out the Amazon Echo Show 5, which is an inexpensive display that offers all the smarts Alexa has to offer with a nice visual touch.

There are plenty of things to like about the Amazon Echo Show 5. As the name suggests, the smart display has a 5-inch screen that shows information in a visual way. For example, you'll be able to see information about the weather when you ask about the forecast, and you'll be able to control smart home devices with touch controls. You can even watch videos on the screen, which can come in handy when you're learning a new recipe or want to catch up on the news.

The Show 5 has pretty good speakers and it's not too expensive, so if you want, you could get several of the smart displays for different rooms in your home. It's nice and compact as well, so it should fit nicely in any room.

The Amazon Echo Show 5 is available in Charcoal and Sandstone, and it's on sale for $64.99, which is $25 off the normal price of $89.99. We don't know how long the deal will last. You can get it for yourself using the link below.
description: Amazon Echo Show 5 is one of the best smart displays you can buy. For a limited time, Amazon is offering the device at $25 off its normal price.
